body: can we maybe talk about the fact that avicus has gone down the past three weekends when more than like 4 people are on. i feel like if anything the time that avicus should 100% be up is over the weekend when all the people get on, but like clockwork the server goes down every weekend. i guess the server hardware has just gotten to a sorry state where it can't handle more than 50 people or something.
